distro.name: Impi Linux
distro.description: ImpiLinux is a complete desktop operating system based on the Ubuntu operating system.

advantages.advantage: Impi is truly South African variant of the popular Ubuntu platform.
Impi is initially available in English, Xhosa and Afrikaans.

ImpiLinux is fully compatible with Ubuntu, meaning that any one of the 14000 software packages available in the Ubuntu "Universe" repository can be loaded onto any ImpiLinux distribution at any time without the hassles of software dependencies and incompatibilities.

disadvantages.disadvantage: In comparison with Ubuntu, Impi has a small user support community.
